column4: anyone know why do I have a green picture when using HDMI on ubuntu 10.04? i3 onboard graphics. worked fine on this monitor, not on TV though
you could see if the nvidia-blue-fix works for you as well?  http://www.wiredrevolution.com/ubuntu/fix-blue-tinted-video-in-ubuntu
actually if it's ok with monitor - don't bother...
